channel.title: Markdown on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Arrans github.io

item.description: Python tool for converting files and office documents to Markdown.

item.description: 🔥 Turn entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Scrape, crawl and extract with a single API.

item.title: toeverything/AFFiNE
item.description: There can be more than Notion and Miro. AFFiNE(pronounced [ə‘fain]) is a next-gen knowledge base that brings planning, sorting and creating all together. Privacy first, open-source, customizable and ready to use.

item.title: usememos/memos
item.description: A modern, open-source, self-hosted knowledge management and note-taking platform designed for privacy-conscious users and organizations.

item.title: GitbookIO/gitbook
item.description: The open source frontend for GitBook doc sites

item.title: pbek/QOwnNotes
item.description: QOwnNotes is a plain-text file notepad and todo-list manager with Markdown support and Nextcloud / ownCloud integration.

item.title: blinkospace/blinko
item.description: An open-source, self-hosted personal AI note tool prioritizing privacy, built using TypeScript .

item.title: logseq/logseq
item.description: A privacy-first, open-source platform for knowledge management and collaboration. Download link: http://github.com/logseq/logseq/releases. roadmap: http://trello.com/b/8txSM12G/roadmap

item.title: siyuan-note/siyuan
item.description: A privacy-first, self-hosted, fully open source personal knowledge management software, written in typescript and golang.

item.title: basicmachines-co/basic-memory
item.description: AI conversations that actually remember. Never re-explain your project to Claude again. Local-first, integrates with Obsidian. Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/tyvKNccgqN

item.description: A simple, Git-powered wiki with a local frontend and support for many kinds of markup and content.

item.description: 🦉 Free open-source notetaking app with real-time sync 🔄⚡️🚀

item.description: Generate minimal, fast & beautiful docs from Markdown. No React, no bloat, just content. Built for developers.

item.title: DumbWareio/DumbPad
item.description: A Dumb Pad with collaborative editing, fuzzy search, & markdown preview functionality

item.title: solworktech/md2pdf
item.description: A CLI utility that generates PDFs from Markdown. Features: syntax highlighting (for code blocks), dark, light and custom themes, TOC autogeneration,tables, pagination control (using horizontal lines - especially useful for presentations), page Footer (consisting of author, title and page number), support of non-Latin charsets and multiple font

item.title: cool-calm/collected-press
item.description: Render Markdown from any public GitHub repo or gist

item.title: dart-archive/markdown
item.description: A Dart markdown library
